QuestData.Title: The High Chieftain
QuestData.Description: I understand what Ebonhorn has been trying to tell me for a while now.$b$bOur people do not need a hammer, we need a leader. One willing to stand against any threat, even if they are terrified to do so.$b$bAnd between you and me, I am definitely terrified, but resolved.$b$bLet us return to Thunder Totem and prepare ourselves for war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mayla Highmountain at Thunder Totem.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mayla Highmountain at Thunder Totem.
QuestData.RewardText: Even without the hammer, I know what to do next. When our forces are rallied, we can take the fight to the Underking.
